name: BearMiner
description:
BearMiner

We created this game with the thought that we will take part in Mini Jam 43.
Unfortunately, due to lack of time, we couldn't finish it.
The theme was a "Travel", that's why we wanted to create a game about traveling to the center of the Earth.

Features
• Hurry up and go as low as you can!
• Bounce off the walls and gain speed.
• Collect power ups and get higher score.

Controls
• Use Arrows to move.
• Use SpaceBar to activate bonus. 

Credits
This game was created by Piotr Gałązka and Daniel Olszak, except music and sounds effects. Audio credits:
